title: Roche 's expenditure on research and development 2007 to 2019
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Expenditure in million Swiss francs, with a total of 13 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2019 to 2011.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2011 to 2009.
Differently, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2009 to 2007.
gold: This statistic shows the expenditure on research and development of pharmaceutical company Roche from 2007 to 2019 . Roche is a Swiss-based pharmaceutical company , and one of the leading pharma companies worldwide . In 2019 , Roche 's expenditure on research and development came to nearly 12 billion Swiss francs .
